issue.title: [FlightRPC][C++] Remove default constructor for FlightClientOptions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10250](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10250). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should delete the default constructor for FlightClientOptions and require the struct to always be initialized with Defaults().

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10250?focusedCommentId=17306258) by yibocai#1 (yibocai#1):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9728
